message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.CE

The paper discusses a novel method for computing the Knowledge-Gradient policy for optimization, which is a popular choice for Bayesian optimization of deterministic engineering simulations. This topic falls under the broad category of machine learning and optimization, which is covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. The most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper proposes a new method for optimization based on Bayesian learning. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science), as the paper discusses the application of the proposed method to engineering simulations and benchmark functions.
